title: Power and constraints on UK Prime Minister

content.question: Describe one power of the British prime minister. Describe one way that the British parliamentary system restrains the power of the prime minister. Explain how parliamentary systems enhance the power of the prime minister in the policy-making process.

frqParts.text: Describe one power of the British prime minister. Describe one way that the British parliamentary system restrains the power of the prime minister. Explain how parliamentary systems enhance the power of the prime minister in the policy-making process.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
